name: TechHuddle
description:
TechHuddle (London, UK) helps companies grow faster and more profitably by helping them access IT talent in Bulgaria (Sofia, Plovdiv, etc). 
TechHuddle was born from our CEOs (himself a respected CTO by background) frustrations with IT outsourcing and his belief that there must be a better way. 
TechHuddle is one of the fastest growing IT companies in Bulgaria! 
What do you get with TechHuddle?
Up to 50% savings compared to local resources
Access to tens of thousands of IT specialists
90% plus retention rate
Increased productivity
Faster time to market
What services does TechHuddle provide?
Dedicated teams
Product development
App development
QA
DevOps
Etc.
We have experts in virtually every technology including Java/Spring, C# .Net, PHP (Laravel, Symfony, Yii, Zend), Ruby on Rails, Python/Django, Node, GoLang, Angular, Rect/Redux, Vue, iOS (Objective-C / Swift), Android, Ionic, React Native, Flutter, Amazon Web Services, Azure, Azure, Hybris, Magento, Salesforce Commerce Cloud (Demandware), Shopware, Pimcore, Spryker, Automation Testing, etc. 
READ MORE...
